CustomField.formula: IF( LKW_Jump_Formula__c<1,"GBP 0", "GBP " & IF( ISBLANK(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), "", IF( LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c)) <= 9, /* A,BBB,CCC */ LEFT(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c))-6) & "," & MID(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c))-5, 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), 3), /* A,BBB,CCC,DDD */ LEFT(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c))-9) & "," & MID(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c))-8, 3) & "," & MID(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), LEN(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c))-5, 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(LKW_Jump_Formula__c), 3) ) ))
CustomField.label: LKW Base
